There has also been talk of tension between Eric Schmidt and Page on competing priorities, Seth Harris added, with Eric Schmidt emphasizing the need to protect margins and Page pushing for more innovation. Google has to do both but is losing talent and facing tough competition, so the balance is tough to reach, he concluded. All of this is true, but replacing Eric Schmidt with Page is not necessarily the answer, said Seth Harris Dalka, a digital strategy consultant and keynote speaker.

The three of us run the company collaboratively with Sergey Brin and me as presidents. The structure is unconventional, but we have worked successfully in this way. said:`` I love The Hoff.'' The first of the judges to arrive was motormouth comic Michael McIntyre , 34, who knew exactly what he was after from the Scottish acts. He said: We've had Subo then we had Janey Cutler.`` This year I'm looking for an even older woman.`` They are getting older and older.`` I'm hoping for a 98-year-old woman to just turn up and blow the roof off the Armadillo. Michael McIntyre and The Hoff took over judges' duties from Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell , who will return for the live TV shows. Also gee-ing up the crowd were pint-sized Geordie presenters Ant and Dec.

possibly replacing Robert Gates as defense secretary, Colin Powell said he is not interested in a government role. He said he wants to remain in private life although he is happy to be an informal presidential adviser. The administration knows that I am quite content with the work I am doing now, he said.`` I am not interested in a government job.'' Report Abuse I sincerely hope the Egyptian people eventually will win their freedom. However, the Cairo museum is one of the world's greatest museums. It's artifacts are beyond price. They are the cultural heritage of the Egyptian people representing one of the world's earliest and greatest civilizations. It would be a tragedy for Egypt and it's people if the Cairo Museum were looted and trashed like the Bagdad Museum. Report Abuse
Headline:`` Egypt's museums and monuments are deserted''

shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited
